item.title: BDF Tandem Truck Pack v151.00 ETS2
item.description:
BDF Tandem Truck Pack v151.00 ETS2

Version 151.00 Changelog – Fixed a few things, – Updated files to game version 1.50 – No gate collesion included are also updated to game version 1.50

This mod contains: 17 trucks 120 Chassis 310 Cargo Body Boxes 62 drawbar Trailers 27 Tandem Trailers 8 NO Trailer version Accessories for all chassis, spare tyres, extra tanks, extra battery, extra closet, painted or skined. 2-4 different sideskirts for all chassis, one to use with closet and one in full length for each chassis.


How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Jan Mayen Addon v1.0 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
Jan Mayen Addon v1.0 1.50 ETS2

Tiny map mod adding the island of Jan Mayen. Originally made to practice detailing with minimal info.

Features: Olonkinbyen Puppebu A couple of companies Ferry from Bergen road

Compatibility: ETS2 1.50 All DLC (up to West Balkans) is required (probably) Likely compatible with most map mods Obviously incompatible with Digital X’s/Geno’s Jan Mayen Island map mod.


How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Project Better Arizona + Reforma Connection v0.4 1.50 ATS
item.description:
Project Better Arizona + Reforma Connection v0.4 1.50 ATS

Changelogs v0.4 – ATS 1.50 compatibility – Added the towns of Prescott and Yarnell – Re-added existing State Route 89 and extended it through Prescott to US Route 93 – Slight signage and small detail improvements to US 93 and US 60 in Wickenburg – Fixed a terrain gap on the Loop 303 South on-ramp from US 60 – Packaged the mod with the new SCS mod packer that may potentially improve performance

Better Arizona is a map mod project for American Truck Simulator that aims to improve existing cities and add new towns and roads to the state of Arizona in the game.

REQUIRES MEGA RESOURCES


How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Volvo FH16 2012 v1.50.1.4s ETS2
item.description:
Volvo FH16 2012 v1.50.1.4s ETS2

Changelogs v1.50.1.4s – Added missing interior model – Fixes errors in gamelog

Latest version content: – 4 Cabins. – 88 Chassis, 7 Original and 81 Additional. (4×2, 6x2_4, 6×2, 6×4, 8×4, 8×6, 8×8, 10×4, 10×6 and 10×10) normal, long, low deck, mitlift and taglift. (6x2_4, 6×2, 6×4, 8×4, 8×6, 8×8 and 10×10) tandem. – 16 New Engines. – 8 New Transmissions. – 4 Original Interiors. – Over 230 Paint Jobs (If you have all DLC). – All Original Accessories + Headlights, Sideskirts, Fenders, Rear Bumpers, Middle Exhausts, LED and lights bar for side deflector, Small Lights, Text Logo, Angel Eyes Lights, Decal, Painted Bull Bar, Cam Mirror, Corner Eye and Decoration Lights for each of l2h3, l2h3_8x4 and l2h3 tandem cabine. – All Original Interior Accessories + Glass Hookup, Toyhang, Light Boards, Interior Back Lights, Cam Mirror and Corner Eye. – FMOD sound effects. – Left-Right windows animation. – Dynamix Heavy Duty tires. – Swedish Paint Job. – Tandem chassis. – Tandem trailers. – Tandem trailers with dolly. – 1+5 Axles Extendable Long. – 1+5 Axles Extendable Short. – JOST branded 5th wheels.

1 DLC is required to use this mod, in other ways, it will be Incompatible. dlc_volvo_tuning_pack “FH Tuning Pack”


How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Cadillac V16 1930 + Interior v1.50 ATS
item.description:
Cadillac V16 1930 + Interior v1.50 ATS

Cadillac V16 1930 – this modification adds an old classic car model for ATS / ETS2 players with its own interior, wheels, and passengers. 1930 was one of the most important years in Cadillac history. The brand was the first in the world to present a production car with a V-16 engine.

Features Cadillac V16 1930: – independent car model – High quality 3D model – High-quality detailed exterior – High-quality detailed interior – the model has its own wheels – the model has its own interior – the model has its own sound – Correct car proportions – Correct seat positions for peds – working lights – working mirrors – the character is correctly sitting in the driver’s seat – correct position of the Cadillac logo – the choice of body color / metallic paint/skins – The correct position of the player – tunning accessories present – interior accesories support – Support for passengers (similar to bus mod) – Supports all major functions of the game – buy in Acces Mod dealer


How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
